input.sentences: there was a ton of traffic as we drove into the city to catch the game .
after getting some food we found our seats to watch the game .
our team was winning just about the entire game .
at half time we got to see the cheerleaders dance and cheer .
the game finished up and everyone had a great time .
output.sentences: The day we tried to get to the NCAA Men's Final - first, tons of traffic.
When we got to the auditorium, we realized that our seats were much closer than we thought. Here is the view!
Imagine being this close when the first half ended with this amazing 3-pointer!
Then we got to enjoy the halftime show. These gals were hot!
You could just smell the defeat as Duke lost. Being present for this event was monumental!
